sentences.en: "It will only be a good idea to know your APOE genotype when there's something we can do about it, " she says.
sentences.cn: “只有当我们可以做出改变的时候，知道你的载脂蛋白E基因才 会是一件好事”，她说。

sentences.en: A common problem in studies attempting to relate genetics with a particular behavior is that a particular genotype might only confer a very small risk.
sentences.cn: 在试图将遗传学与特定行为联系起来的研究中，一般的问题是一个特定的基因型可能只造成一丁点风险。

sentences.en: Amplification of resistance, however , was found only in polyresistant Beijing genotype strains.
sentences.cn: 耐药扩增仅在北京基因型单耐药菌株表现明显.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION: Positive genotype of RANTES gene promoter - 28 G may be related to DN.
sentences.cn: 结论: RANTES基因启动子 -28G 阳性基因型可能与糖尿病肾病相关.

sentences.en: Genotype refers to the genetic make - up of an organism or a virus.
sentences.cn: 基因型指生物或病毒的基因结构.

sentences.en: In genotype 3, we get about 75 percent clearance in 6 month.
sentences.cn: 而在基因3型, 我们发现约75%的病人可以在6个月时清除病毒.

sentences.en: In north america there are six terrestrial animal genotypes including the raccoon virus genotype.
sentences.cn: 在北美洲有六个陆生动物基因型，包括浣熊病毒基因型。

sentences.en: In truly doubtful cases, only test crosses will reveal the actual genotype.
sentences.cn: 在确实可疑的情况下, 只有通过杂交试验才能揭示出真正的基因型.

sentences.en: Kentucky bluegrass regeneration system research progress in the world were summarized in this paper on the influencing factors such as the choice of explants, culture conditions, genotype and so on.
sentences.cn: 在草地早熟禾再生体系建立的过程中，就其影响因素如外植体的选择、培养条件、基因型等方面综述了国内外草地早熟禾再生体系的研究进展。

sentences.en: Methods: Polymer - ase chain reaction ( PCR ) was used to determine the ACE genotype.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用聚合酶链反应 ( PCR ) 方法检测ACE基因型.

sentences.en: Multiplex PCR showed that HBV - Brandt is HBV genotype A.
sentences.cn: MultiplexPCR 基因型鉴定表明HBV -Brandt 属于乙型肝炎病毒A型.

sentences.en: NUE of three types of NF exist genotype difference.
sentences.cn: 各类型氮肥的利用率均具有基因型差异.

sentences.en: Objective:To analyze the relationship between the genotype and phenotype of autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease(ADPKD) in Han nationality in East China.
sentences.cn: 目的：研究华东地区汉族人常染色体显性遗传性多囊肾病（ADPKD）基因型与临床表现型的关系。

sentences.en: Results The genotype of mixed infection was genotype 1 and 3.
sentences.cn: 结果确认此病例的基因型为1型和3型的混合感染.

sentences.en: The advantaged gene and genotype of FSH � � had increased.
sentences.cn: 其中FSHβ的有利基因和基因型的频率都有所提高.

sentences.en: The bb, aa or tt genotype will increase the susceptibility of vitiligo.
sentences.cn: 携带维生素D受体 基因纯合子bb 、 aa或tt基因型 可能会增加对白癜风的易感性.

sentences.en: The Bsm I genotype VDR gene were nonassociated with BMD in female.
sentences.cn: 女性VDR基因(Bsm)多态性与BMD无明显相关.

sentences.en: The genotype of the individual is permanently set.
sentences.cn: 个体的基因型就永久地被固定下来.

sentences.en: The software analyzes the person’s HIV genotype and his or her current health characteristics against an evolving database of treatment outcomes for more than 33,000 patients and 98,000 therapies.
sentences.cn: 该软件能够针对超过98 000病人和 33 000治疗不断变化的治疗结果的数据库，以及他或她目前的健康规格参数，分析人的艾滋病毒基因型。

sentences.en: There is a difference among genotype in ratio of ARS to WRS.
sentences.cn: 有效吸收面积ARS与根系总表面积WRS的 比值具有品种间的差异.

sentences.en: Therefore, P should be substituted by a response surface for each genotype.
sentences.cn: 因此, P必须被各个基因型的反应面所代替.

trans.tran_en: the  genetic  nature of one type of living thing
